title: Un Monde Vegan
description: Un Monde Vegan, meaning "a vegan world," is a 100% vegan retail shop in Paris as well as an online store. It features a wide range of products including packaged and chilled foods, faux meats, vegan cheese, snacks and chocolates. Also has nutritional supplements, food for animals, vegan shoes and accessories, eco-friendly cleaning and bodycare products. Established since 2009.
